channel.title: Fake Jagex Account warning
channel.description:
Hello moparscape, this is a warning about an email I got today that I was a little weirded out about, considering the fact that I was online on runescape and wasn't kick off and banned. Please be weary of any email from jagex, the email address has been hacked to show it as jadgex's real email but the email will lead you to this site http://services.runescaye.com/loginform.php?mod=www&ssl=4&&dest=title.ws . Please I advise all of you to look over your email message from jadex before logging in on their site.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/32zqrl3.jpg[/img]

item.title: Fake Jagex Account warning
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:31, topic:385598”][quote author=Cres link=topic=481350.msg3526741#msg3526741 date=1299882917]
lmao , shouldn’t we try and do the same with R - S nubs to prove Mopar is better xD
[/quote]
Unlike you the high ranking members (and no I don’t mean people who have 200 rep, rep is pointless) believe in not scamming no mater what. Key loggers, account phishing and all other acts are frowned upon here. If you want that go to some other site.[/quote]

Yeah , but imagine you got phished , and you know who did it , are you just gonna stand there or counter-attack?
idk about you , but i’d go home and bake some waffels and pancakes…

Read full topic

item.title: Fake Jagex Account warning
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

We should really set up a system of here were people have to send a request to you and you have to click yes on that request for people to get your email. It only took about a half an hour to fix all the glitches on my old site for it and the users really liked it.

When you register, dont you have an option that only admins can see your email?
And im pretty sure you can modify it in your profile :o

Edit:
Never mind, thats only for them emailing you using the website.

Read full topic

item.title: Fake Jagex Account warning
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:13, topic:385598”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=481350.msg3525393#msg3525393 date=1299765982]
just got that e-mail and wanted to post about it here,

seems like someone hacked jagex
[/quote]
No one hacked jagex, the process of making an email look like its from someone else is called email spoofing and can be done threw command prompt quite easily.[/quote]ow diden’t knew that

i also almost fell for it (godthank google for making me aware it’s a phishing site) cuz i gave away my account to Tabbykiller

Read full topic
